heading: Tuesday Night
text: Mostly cloudy or becoming so. Chance of wintry mix late in the St. Lawrence Valley.  Lows from the mid teens to lower 20s, rising through the 20s in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys. Winds becoming south 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 35 mph in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys.

heading: Wednesday
text: Partly to mostly cloudy. Periods of light snow, rain, or wintry mix, mainly from the Adirondacks and Route 2 northward. Highs from the mid 30s to around 40 south and in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys, low to mid 30s elsewhere north. South winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 25 mph in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys, becoming west in the afternoon.

heading: Wednesday Night
text: Mostly to partly cloudy. Scattered snow or early rain showers north, and in the southern Greens. Lows in the teens to around 20. Winds from the west early, near and north of Route 2; otherwise from the south 5 to 10 mph, and gusting to 20 mph late in the Champlain Valley.
